alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 03 at 10:52AM EDT until April 06 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Grand River near Comstock Park affecting Kent County. Red Cedar River At East Lansing affecting Ingham County. .Recent heavy rain, combined with several additional rounds of rain over the next few days, will prolong the minor flooding conditions already occurring. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Cedar River At East Lansing. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of low lying areas, adjacent parks, and farmland. At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of the Michigan State University athletic fields. The Potter Park Zoo parking lot in Lansing begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to drop slightly today before starting to rise once again on Tuesday. The river will crest near or slightly above 7.0 feet Tuesday evening. Additional rain on Wednesday could change this forecast and result in a slightly higher crest that occurs later this week. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.1 feet on 12/29/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr.
